alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 10:12AM EST until further notice by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Defiance, Williams and Fulton OH Counties. .Heavy rain on Wednesday between 1.5 and 2.0 inches will cause excess runoff that will lead to minor flooding along the Tiffin River in northwest Ohio. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood waters begin to affect some farm buildings near Stryker and flood some secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to 12.1 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall Friday evening. It will rise to 13.5 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
